com.bumptech.glide.resize.cache
Interface MemoryCache

All Known Implementing Classes:
LruMemoryCache, MemoryCacheAdapter
public interface MemoryCache

An interface for adding and removing from an in memory cache

Nested Class Summary
static interface MemoryCache.ImageRemovedListener
          An interface that will be called whenever a bitmap is removed from the cache.
 
Method Summary
 void clearMemory()
          Evict all items from the memory cache.
 boolean contains(java.lang.String key)
          Tell if cache contains key

          Add bitmap to the cache with the given key

          Set the listener to be called when a bitmap is removed from the cache
 void trimMemory(int level)
          Trim the memory cache to the appropriate level.
 

Method Detail

contains

boolean contains(java.lang.String key)
Tell if cache contains key

Parameters:
key - The key
Returns:
true iff the key has a non null value in the cache

get

android.graphics.Bitmap get(java.lang.String key)
Get a value from the cache

Parameters:
key - The key
Returns:
The bitmap at key or null if the key is not present

put

android.graphics.Bitmap put(java.lang.String key,
                            android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap)
Add bitmap to the cache with the given key

Parameters:
key - The key to retrieve the bitmap
bitmap - The bitmap to store
Returns:
The old value of key (null if key is not in map)

setImageRemovedListener

void setImageRemovedListener(MemoryCache.ImageRemovedListener listener)
Set the listener to be called when a bitmap is removed from the cache

Parameters:
listener - The listener

clearMemory

void clearMemory()
Evict all items from the memory cache.

trimMemory

void trimMemory(int level)
Trim the memory cache to the appropriate level. Typically called on the callback onTrimMemory.

Parameters:
level - This integer represents a trim level as specified in ComponentCallbacks2
